metadata.Title: CVE-2015-7511 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Libgcrypt before 1.6.5 does not properly perform elliptic-point curve multiplication during decryption, which makes it easier for physically proximate attackers to extract ECDH keys by measuring electromagnetic emanations.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-7511` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libgcrypt20 - 1.6.5-2
No subscription required

advisory.DiscoveredBy: Daniel Genkin, Lev Pachmanov, Itamar Pipman and Eran Tromer

criterions.comment: libgcrypt20 package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.6.5-2').
